website_summaries.verdict: One of the best college backpacks to choose if you need the most amount of storage possible.
pros: Extra large design includes plenty of external storage compartments for large and small devices/items
Side pockets are easy to reach while wearing the backpack
cons: The bulk of the backpack may be too much to comfortably carry around on large campuses

customer_reviews.title: So much better than expected; this is a tremendous backpack
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack! I bought this for a cross-country trip and wanted to use it as my carry-on. I have used it everyday since as my new “briefcase.” This is such a great backpack, it fits my laptop & charging cord, files, makeup, gym clothes and shoes with tons of room to spare. I absolutely LOVE it......I will even keep my purse in it and just take my purse out if I have after work drinks or dinner. Have had for over a month and have used it for 2 airplane trips and everyday office use and it still looks brand new. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Brookeh

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to carry over 1 gallon of water, rain suit, safety glasses, gloves and enough food for 12+ hours of work! Backpack is holding up VERY well after lugging around all of said items and tossing the bag to the ground repeatedly. This backpack is better than any I have ever used or seen! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good material, has a lot and I mean a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good material, has a lot and I mean a lot of room you can pack a lot of things, it’s good for school I mainly use it for that, it looks nice with the bold red features. The backpack is very comfortable, well it can be if you don’t pack too much stuff lol, the zippers themselves are really nice metals, yes little things matter. The inside has a really nice material as well and it has a nice texture inside being the brand name. Get this backpack. It’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Tabakovic,Edvin

customer_reviews.title: Bag is amazing, what you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: The moment this back left the box I was satisfied with the quality of the material and more than happy with the space of the bag itself. If I ever need another bag this is the first place I am going to look. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for the best pack there is, This is it
customer_reviews.text: i was very skeptical about spending this much on a bag. pockets are not the same as im used to. after using it now for a couple weeks this pack is freakin awesome! now that its stretched itself out some and become more user friendly i really love this pack. sturdy handle, great construction, lots of pockets more then i can use. straps are of great quality as well and padded sufficiently. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Teagan Stensrud

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is awesome! It’s perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome! It’s perfect for what I need. Has a bunch of pockets. I’m actually still finding new ones. Very durable and I actually can haul 2 laptops in it with no problem. The blue looks great and gives it a unique look. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Fits my 17" HP laptop perfectly. Bought it based on the reviews. Most of the 5 star reviews were on point, although the USB charger was a little falsely advertised. Made it sound like the USB charger was already attached to a power source. You have to buy your own small/pocket charger that hooks up to it. Now we'll see if it stands up to my daily abuse. Will re-review if it falls apart quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Suave

customer_reviews.title: the reason I found it awesome is was looking simply for a bag to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not the kind of guy that would ever buy or look for the option to buy a backpack unless I was going for wilderness. This backpack arrives at every possible option I would long for in the wilderness and business world. Yet, the reason I found it awesome is was looking simply for a bag to put my Laptop, some client files, a few presentation flip charts, my lunch... BAM! All that and I am STILL finding pockets and hangers I didn't even know about! I love this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Juoaquin Behindju

customer_reviews.title: I love my TSA backpack its perfect I like the size ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my TSA backpack its perfect I like the size and the convience of all those pockets everyone likes the color matter of fact my co-workers liked it so much 2 of them ordered the same backpack just different colors. Great product I can load it up with all my goodies, clothes and whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and storage.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my HS son. Must carry everything everywhere now since the HS doesn’t provide lockers due to drugs, guns etc.. Like the rain resistance as he has a campus style school and like the storage space in the pack; plenty big enough! Quality seems good, but time will tell. His last pack was a Thule and it lasted several years, but didn’t have as much space. If this one makes it even as close to as long, it will be an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the first pack, but the seller made it right and I haven't had a problem since. Been using this pack daily for a couple months and I am happy. Thank you Mia!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robb

customer_reviews.title: The best backpack I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I’m a Nurse and this is great for all my medical equipment, books and food. It’s so sturdy and great quality. You can tell it was really thought out. It’s big enough for everything but not too big to feel overwhelmed. The best backpack I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Defective product!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with how this is made. It looks like mine came alittle defected because my lock strap is sawed shut. I can’t put a lock threw the hole to get to the zipper on the other side of the bag it seems fine. Upset with the material it’s really not that great and also it’s not WORTH anywhere near 55 for this bag. It does have a lot of compartments and I really have no choice but to keep this terrible bag because I need it for college NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my teenage son. Bag is well made, but the plastic buckles on the shoulder strap are prone to break. There is no support that we have been able to find to replace a broken plastic buckle on the shoulder strap. Makes the backpack kind of useless for us.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R

customer_reviews.title: Impressive !!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I'm really impressed with this backpack. I ride my motorcycle a lot. It feels strong and its comfortable. Also a student so textbooks are in there and there is plenty of space and pockets for a lot of things. Guess what, it even fits my full face helmet. Love that. It also has a usb cable in the pack so you can connect a battery to charge your mobile devices. The color blue with black looks great. The top handle is great. I never had a pack with such a strong handle. It's great. Highly recommended this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from large Sampsonite bag. Appears sturdy, very light. Holds a lot more. Holds my coat, lunch bag, electronics, a book to read, and more.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Clark

customer_reviews.title: Backpack has started to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack less than 6 months ago and already it's falling apart on the inside of the bag... I have had other backpacks for 4-5 years before they need to be replaced... I don't think I am abusing the bags in any way... Then I first got it, I loved this bag... I have taken it around the world (no joke)... Now I cant even use it....
customer_reviews.author: Skye T.

customer_reviews.title: Legit backpack
customer_reviews.text: My husband took this Japan (2 connecting flights there and three connecting flights back) and it held up with two laptops, a pillow, snacks, charger cords, a couple books...you get the drift. He crammed it full and it held its part of the bargain. Zippers didn’t fail. Straps didn’t break. This backpack is legit.
customer_reviews.author: Asileven

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The backpack has a tear after only 3 months of use for a high school freshman and needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ted R Renneker

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 2 months. DO NOT use for school or heavy stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for college because it could fit my laptop and seemed to be sturdy. Well, it is sturdy on the outside. But the inside is made out of cheap material, especially the divider between the middle and front compartment. I've used this backpack for 2 months when the divider ripped. I've tried stitching it together but the material keeps getting loose and rips even more. DO NOT use this for carrying heavy things like books and binders. This is NOT a good college backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Cuppy

customer_reviews.title: Liner ripped after 22 days/ Easy Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Update: contacted seller & the backpack was replaced!!!!! yay!!! I received the backpack within to days of starting the return! Wish me luck! Received this backpack on March 4 and 22 days later the liner rips. There was a week Spring Break in there too with no use.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dog New Tricks

customer_reviews.title: Huge and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it fits in all overheads and has tons of room. Only issue is it's so big I lose stuff constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: The computer sleeve of the bag is marginially large enouth for my 17" 2-in-1.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack/computer bag to use when traveling. I was disappointed when I received it because the computer sleeve is not large enough for my 17' Dell 7786 2-in-1 laptop. There is not much padding/cushioning in the computer sleeve in order to make if fit a 17" laptop. Computer protection was the primary reason I chose this product. Water resistance and USB capabilities were not the main reasons I bought this produce. However I found it interesting that the first correspondence I received from the shipper was instructions on what I needed to buy to use the USB feature. The backpack will work fine for other uses but would work better with a 15" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked, but unsure about quality.
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked this backpack. I got it because it had more volume than my any of my SwissGear backpacks that I've had for YEARS with no quality issues. I used this backpack on ONE trip and it already ripped! The worst part was that it wasn't even as packed as my SwissGear packs have been in the past due to the higher volume! I'm pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adiel Colon

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I’ve owned. I bring it everywhere with me, prepared for zombie apocolypse.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned it for at least 6 months now. It’s been through some abuse like throwingit onto the ground from 3 feet, crushed in my car sometimes, but still working fine and shiny. Zippers are pretty strong. This stores a lot, but I wish they made a bigger version of this because I carry everything to survive in the event of a zombie apocolypse.
customer_reviews.author: Nga Duong

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I expected and has plenty of room. This bag seems to be very durable and should last a long time. There is a charging outlet but you will need a portable battery pack. This bag is a little heavy and I probably should have purchased the 15inch one. So far I really like it and I can carry all of my workbooks, comp. tablet 2 phones, spare set of clothes and office supplies. If you need all this storage this is the bag to get. Fits well on shoulders and cinches up nicely. I actually put an extra towel in for good measure since I have so much stuff to lug around.
customer_reviews.author: Bafire

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan, flops all over the place
customer_reviews.text: For $70 I was expecting a backpack that could stand up on its own. There are a TON of storage places but, dare I say, too many storage options? I was getting lost in the backpack and unless you're a hoarder there's really no need for a million different hiding places. I could have gotten over that but the kicker is that it's flimsy/floppy so it doesn't instill any confidence that it will stand the test of time. I'm returning it and trying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: tron1982x

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag/Backpack for Travel, Business or Recreation
customer_reviews.text: Multiple specialized storage compartments. Hold a 4-cell 18650 battery pack in an internal side pocket with external USB port for recharging about any personal electronic device. Unfolds for quick TSA screening, as advertised. One suggestion for improvement: Black on black with black zippers is somewhat confusing for opening the correct compartment the first time. Used Multicolor heat shrink tubing to color code the dual zippers on each compartment. Adding a short colored cord lanyard also helps identifying the right zipper for each compartment. Not only new carry on, but also goes to the office with me on a daily basis now. (Best man-purse ever?). Don't care - its a great bag/backpack for most any purpose.
customer_reviews.author: TCup

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity. Works very well for kids in high school to carry all those books.
customer_reviews.text: With the enhanced cleaning protocols in place due to the pandemic, my daughter had to bring everything home from school each night. That's a lot of stuff, and we're not even into jacket and coat weather yet. Her old backpack was literally straining at the seams with all that stuff in it. This backpack has a place for her water bottle (they're not allowed to use drinking fountains this year, another virus protocol), her phone, and all her books. It holds all that stuff and has a little bit of room left over.
customer_reviews.author: Jack HTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with lots of pockets!  Great travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: I’m digging this bag more and more as I transfer stuff into it. I travel a lot and so my backpack has all of my essential items like meds, computer, trip docs, liquids etc. this thing is loaded with pockets everywhere—I love it! When I purchased it I overlooked the fact that it has a USB port on the outside that can connect to your own USB travel battery. Nice touch! This seems well-built with good materials and craftsmanship. I like that the handle on top has a braided steel cable and is secured well through the fabric. You could carry a lot of weight in this without stressing the handle. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: WeazL

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag. Could be more rigid
customer_reviews.text: Received the bag in a folded fashion likely to reduce the size for shipping. That is understandable. That fold causes the bag to fold onto itself when in use thereafter, due to the crease from shipping. It would be nice if the bag had some added rigidness to allow the bag to stand on its own more easily. It does have ample storage space and various pockets. It's been in use for a few months and not other issues were experienced. This bag was picked for the additional straps above the side pockets, which aides in keeping larger water bottles from magically plopping onto the parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Great at first and then it started to fall apat right after the NO-return date.
customer_reviews.text: At first, we loved this back-pack. It was perfect for my husband to travel with. The fabric then started to pull apart and fray at the zippers and then the zippers didn't stay locked and would just randomly open up. Not good when your traveling! I now have to buy another back-pack. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Trina Tuel

customer_reviews.title: Don't click on purchase
customer_reviews.text: The reviews regarding durability are true. Purchased the warranty and now wondering if that was a waste also...read the fine print. Purchased the backpack about 3 months ago and was weary after reading the reviews but decided to take a chance. I have a 17" laptop and that was the main reason as I prefer a backpack over a shoulder bag. I carry a laptop and a small padfolio...nothing excessive or heavy. Seams have ripped and yesterday the zipper separated. Looking for a shoulder bag now as this purchase was a waste of money. Maybe this bag was one in a hundred that fails...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid backpack. The separate spaces are designed well. Papers in one section, lunch/snacks in another. Small items in the front. Laptop is well protected and is easily large enough for my 15" laptop, and would probably hold a 17" fine. The charging port works great with an internal spot for the battery so it is not just laying in the bottom. Simply attach your cord to the external USB port and you are in business. The water bottle pockets on the sides are tall enough to keep my water bottle or travel coffee cup in place without risk of falling out. 5 stars from me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag has plenty of room for storage and fits under airline seats. While the manufacturer states that one can unzip the bag and lay it flat for the screening of the laptop, I was made to take my laptop out each time. This feature was important to me, as I thought it would cut down on the things I had to remove to get through airport security. Unfortunately, it didn't help me there, but it is a good, spacious bag. The USB port is useful. The pocket that holds the battery charger was perfect for my 24.600 battery charger. Lots of pockets on the outside, which made getting to items I used regularly very easy. I'd recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: No stars! This Backpack Is Too Small For My Needs!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this backpack! It is too small for my needs! I specifically asked for an extra large backpack! Instead, what amazon sent me was a standard size backpack! I could have went to the Chelsea neighborhood in Manhattan and found something closer to what I was actually looking for! Perhaps I should asked for a backpack that can hold a 17-inch laptop! I wouldn’t recommend this backpack to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Found the love of my life!
customer_reviews.text: What can I possibly add to this description that hasn't been said already. Everything the product claims to be and have is exactly what you get. I'm beyond thrilled and I am also a 5 foot 2 female who can store a lot in this baby. I put the heaviest up top after packing the lightest on the bottom so it doesn't cause more weight. I'm ready and I mean really ready for an emergency evacuation! My friend just purchased one for herself and she's extremely satisfied too :O).
customer_reviews.author: NYNONI

customer_reviews.title: Seems Roomy, and opens flat.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for rocks and whatnot. Why rocks? Because if you stuff em with rocks, and carry them around for a few days, by the time you are ready for your trip, your freshly loaded backpack containing clothes, shoes, tablet, toiletries, underroos, and kitchen sink, will be soooo much lighter. Your plane ride will be a joyous occasion, like a TWA commercial from the 60s. Just be sure to clean out all the rocks, otherwise TSA may offer a curious look. Seems well made, and will update this review once I have it for six months. Wished it had better padding in the pocket area to protect the electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Photog1500

customer_reviews.title: Great, roomy backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, Love this backpack. My son is hard on backpacks and I think this will last at least through the school year. It’s sturdy, well-made and looks good. I had his initials embroidered on it in red to match the trim.
customer_reviews.author: M. Verdun

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. Sturdily made
customer_reviews.text: I used this as my main bag while touring in Scotland. It fit all my daily necessities as well as some gear, and when I had a day away from the tour it fit everything I needed for an overnight in the highlands. I used this backpack heavily every day for a month and it is still holding up beautifully. All the stitching and zippers are in good shape :) The only thing that is a little less than ideal is that it isn’t waterproof, but it will keep your stuff dry in a misting. If it’s really coming down, you will be drying out your passport later.
customer_reviews.author: olivia hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a FIT!!
customer_reviews.text: This does fit a Lenovo 17" which measures larger than some other 17" computers apparently (or else some people who answered the question don't actually own one, or didn't actually measure their own computers). I had returned 2 bags already that said it fit 17" laptops. The Lenovo measurements are 11 1/2 x 16 1/2 and on diagonal measures 19 3/4" Water resistance got an average from me because they are the same when resistant as most. Only the water PROOF will be better.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: NOT TSA friendly.. still had to take IPAD out
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my carry on for air travel. It WAS NOT TSA approved as I was still told to take my IPAD out of the back pack which is why I gave this four stars. But there was plenty of room for what I carry on, and a lot of pockets. I did not use the charging port, as I only had a two hour trip and was fully charged before getting on plane and airport. Also, bag is not totally comfortable to carry for long periods of time if full like mine was. And this time I traveled with less than i normally do, yet the pack seemed heavier than an older one.
customer_reviews.author: mom who reads a lot

customer_reviews.title: A hole already
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for grad school. I was excited for the amount of space and the many compartments. The first day I actually filled it and used it I found a home at one of the front pocket seams. Very disappointed and it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tried True

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelling
customer_reviews.text: I don't like checking luggage for short/weekend trips. Once I decided to scale down and use only use the backpack, I couldn't go back to my old ways. Now, I travel with they backpack as my personal item. It will fit more than enough for a weekend trip and you can fit it right under the seat in a plane. The USB charger was very helpful. While everyone was looking for plugs for their electronics, I was able to sit in my seat comfortably and charge my laptop without even having to move. There are tons of pockets and made of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Holds Up Well for Rough Travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack a year ago to use for my frequent business trips to Asia. I use it a carry-on in addition to my checked luggage (I split the clothing so that if my checked luggage is lost I still have something to wear). After arrival in Asia I remove the clothes and use it as a laptop bag. The bag is roomy and has lots of storage space and strong handles. I max it out on my 3 week trips and it has held up really great. All the zippers still work, no problems with torn or loose handles, and no holes. I would definitely recommend this for travelers or everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pope

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well designed all purpose Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect size backpack with lots of space and well designed for todays electronics to gain access to quickly. The USB external port is brilliant. Now being able to keep my battery charger inside the backpack while charging is perfect for all occasions that arise. The compartment to hold all laptops, iPads, phones to just lay open without removing the items for the TSA at airport security is awesome. No more chance of leaving a valuable piece of electronics behind and all speeds access thru security.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Shaps MD

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is WOW!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW! This backpack is AMAZING! I bought 4 backpacks for my kids for school this year. This is the only non-name brand backpack I bought and it is turning out to be the BEST! THIS IS A TOUGH BACKPACK! Still looks brand new. TONS of room! I was worried since it was an off brand backpack, but this backpack is amazing. AMAZING! All I can say is WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Odom

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been doing a lot of traveling for work and asked me to find him a new laptop backpack. He is very particular and I was hoping for the price point this would be a good bag. He loves it. He called me from his travels to thank me and tell me how how much he liked it. We looked at some more expensive bags, but we needed it in just a few days so we had limited options. This worked out well. It arrived in just 3 days and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: bethie623

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack Ever
customer_reviews.text: I fly a lot for work, and often travel with a lot of items like my laptop, video projector, Bluetooth Batteries, Files, Handouts, Cables, and office supplies. This back pack is great. Plenty of space for everything. Lots of pockets to I can keep everything organized, and even a hookup for an extra storage battery for my cellphone or tablet so it's easy to charge. I have used a lot of Bags, Knapsacks, Briefcases, and even small carry on luggage, but this Backpack blows them all away. and it is TSA Friendly.
customer_reviews.author: BiggReddGuy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this product based on my high school kids’ experiences. I bought one for each of my two kiddos. They have had them all week and have been placing several, heavy textbooks. They report that the backpacks are comfortable, having many places to store and organize their school items, and having features that allow storage and access of their iPads, headphones and battery pack. I like that these could also serve for travel. They are very spacious and can fit aboard the plane. They feel and look tough and could be used for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Preciado Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Is a strong back pack to carry stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bough this back pack for my riviera maya trip cause I knew I need a big comfortable bag to carry stuff towels shorts snorkle accessories and other things so iam giving this one a 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Cause it’s veryvery useful I Defenetly love this bag strong material love it very much would Defenetly buy up another in the future thanks
customer_reviews.author: Macky

customer_reviews.title: ***GREAT BUY***
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my son for the new school year. So far the backpack is holding up! Quality of the materials is beyond expectation. Since its brand new I cannot rate on durability or travel. But I will note that it can fit a lot of items in it. I feel that it will also be able to handle my 7th grader. Received it on time and package was intact for an overseas item. The backpack itself was in a large durable plastic sleeve. Which helped protect my purchase even further.
customer_reviews.author: Mely

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 10th grader. His space requirements for books, lunch, after school activities requires a huge backpack and it's difficult to find one that can handle it all. Plus, he walks 5 blocks to and from the bus stop so comfort is key. This backpack did not disappoint. He hasn't complained about his back yet and it's been 3 weeks since school started. There is always room, he never has to clip his lunch to the exterior of the bag like he did in years past. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Stern

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack. Fits better with a sternum chest strap added.
customer_reviews.text: Pack is very well made. I inspected all the stitching and the zippers and it looks great. The pack lacks a sternum chest strap, but I was able to add one that works great!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Obvious

customer_reviews.title: Good bag with large capacity
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older laptop backpack with this one for carry-on during travel. I have carried two laptops in the bag simultaneously without issue many times. So many pockets in this bag. I have yet to run out of space when packing it. For the price listed, I thought I was running the risk of it being cheap material but I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of manufacture. I heavily abuse this product and it's performed well to date. Comfortable to wear, fits all my equipment with room to spare and stows well under seats in planes even when packed with two laptops and other equipment. No buyers remorse from me.
customer_reviews.author: MegamanH

customer_reviews.title: Great storage with lots of compartments
customer_reviews.text: I really like the large storage capacity of this backpack. I like all the different storage compartments. It makes more noise than any other backpacks I have owned due to the zipper pulls hitting each other as you are on the move and it is very noticeable. That is pretty much the only negative I have for the back pack. I love the colors and the fact that I can store a portable power pack inside and still have access to it to power portable devices like a phone, tablet, iPod, or other portable electronic device.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Vilhauer

customer_reviews.title: Ready to Travel
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for months for a replacement laptop travel backpack to replace my Swiss. This was everything I needed except the soft-lined sunglass pouch, but it is everything else. Plenty of storage, smart pockets with two zipper pulls each compartment, and sturdy comfortable handle. Two things I really like that I've never had before is a hold coming out the backpack for headphones and an external USB plug for charging or other connections. This should hold up very well for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and durable Backpack for all needs!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bag with wide opening pockets for easy access which is perfect for traveling even though this backpack was purchased as my 9 yr old daughter's school backpack. It was purchased more for its durability, spaciousness and comfort. Her backpack never weighs less than 35 lbs daily so we lean more toward functionality than fashion for her; however she picked out this color and loves it! We are very impressed by this Backpack and will likely be purchasing one for my husband to use for work and business trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as it appears!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with how much it expanded & all the compartments. It seemed like it was pretty sturdy. Then the strap broke the second day my son used it. I’m quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag..!
customer_reviews.text: Great EDC..! Pockets galore... I ride to work everyday and it’s holding up on the motorcycle filled with stuff including tools and holds the weight and distributes it very well... *** UPDATE *** 2 years after using as EDC I decide I just want to upgrade to what I can tell is the EDC bag to go with according to reviews on YouTube with all the “book bag enthusiast” for $200 after I switch all my EDC gear and having to lose 20% (the new bag is 25L) of the stuff I have carried everyday... I find myself reloading this bag and not wanting to keep the expensive bag that is not living up to its hype...
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: pockets are strange, zippers feel weak
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is okay. It's really large, which is what I was looking for - huge laptop, books, gym stuff, etc. But the pockets are not very intuitive and I wish the very front pocket was larger. sometimes i open up several looking for the thing I want. It also seems topheavy so it slides forward - hard to hold on lap. The zippers are okay, but feel weak and snag. They also make a jingling sound every step I take, no matter how they are spread out. It's okay for now, but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and flexible!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all my adventures and wok needs! Comfortably fits my laptop, charging cables, books, pens, notebooks, and everything else I need for business. When not crammed with notebooks and reference materials, it easily fits clothes for well over two weeks. I even have room for a permanent first aid kit and any necessary toiletries so I never have to unpack and repack the basics! HIGHLY recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: AntArf

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a future trip.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for a trip that I am planning to take in October, so I haven't actually tried it out yet. Since I have been asked three times to give a review, I decided to give it a dry run. I was able to pack my laptop and three days worth of clothing into it comfortably. That is what I need it to do. How well it will fir under the seat of the airplane I'll see in a couple of months. Looks good and sturdy, so I am positive about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Excited to Use My New Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for school. I am 51 years old and am going back to school for my doctorate. I chose this particular model because of its large capacity, USB charging port, the 180 feature to get through airport security, and in particular, the strap that attaches to my luggage. The backpack came and looked just as it did in the pictures. I haven't used it officially yet, however, I have loaded it up, tried it on, and the fit is comfortable. I excited to have the opportunity to use this backpack over the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: Kitsy

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was super fast. It has so many great storage spaces
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack for a business trip to Europe. This is exactly what I needed. Shipping was super fast. It has so many great storage spaces. I had enough room for my laptop, iPad, some clothes and it fit perfectly in the overhead bin. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AMN977

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions
customer_reviews.text: Received item today. Had my wife, who sews, check over the bag for loose threads, bad stitching, crappy workmanship, etc. She said it passed her inspection! It is not made of military duty materials, but is quite adequate in my opinion for regular business travel, toting school books, etc., if handled by someone using reasonable care of their belongings. (Read: Mature) If your kid trashes their stuff because you have not trained them appropriately, then it won't meet your needs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Gets the job done and then some
customer_reviews.text: I can comfortably fit 2 laptops, their peripherals, a 2 inch texbook, large headphones, some clothes, 2 water bottles/drinks, and miscellaneous stationaries all at the same time. Was allowed to take said backpack as a carryon since it was right under the size requirements. I never ended up used the usb extender in any prolonged manner so I can't comment as to it's longevity. Top handle is solidly built. 5/5 Additional thoughts: Backpack was a bit heavy after putting it all in. Maybe have a buckle to connect the 2 shoulder straps together so it is easier to carry.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I had a backpack for years, but it was so worn down I needed another one. This is really important to me because of my work, I need a good backpack. I always have to carry a laptop. This is the BEST backpack I have ever had. It can hold a TON of stuff, and is so easy to access everything I need. The external USB port for an internal power bank is just an awesome add on. It is comfortable to wear (even when I have it absolutely maxed full), and it is waterproof. Doesnt get much better than this. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Gage

customer_reviews.title: Spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I (Tammy's husband) will be frequently using public transit for commuting, and, rather than carry a laptop case, lunchbox, and gym bag, wanted to consolidate into a backpack. When this backpack arrived last night, I immediately tested its capacity with my 17" laptop, lunchbox, and cowboy boots. Everything fits! The construction appears to be sturdy. The shoulder straps are comfortable and easily adjustable. Plenty of other features, some of which I may never use. If you're looking for room to carry bulky items, this backpack has it. If you don't need that much space, a smaller model may be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: TnTexas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for College Student
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson who started college this week. I gave it to him early to take on his graduation trip to China. He absolutely loved it, especially the charging port which permitted him to use his smart phone on the long flight. He loves all the room it provides and feels it will be exactly what he needs as he goes from class to class on campus. I am so pleased this was the bag I selected for him because he is so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Runy

customer_reviews.title: Tons of storage, not much organization
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually too big for using as your personal bag on a plane. Doesn’t fit under the seat well, but what’s worse is the way the bag is laid out with tons of pockets, they have extremely little to help organize them. I’d like to see more pockets and netting. I’d also like the usb hole to do more to protect from water and maybe even consider putting a usb hood as having a live powered connect in the rain could short out your expensive battery. I’m looking for a smaller bag now
customer_reviews.author: PeteT

customer_reviews.title: Needs a wider strap for the carry-on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack except that it kept sliding around when I put it on my carry-on handle. The strap that goes around the carry-on handle needs to be a lot wider so that it stays in place while you're walking through airports. I had to hold the backpack handle and the carry-on handle together to keep it from rolling to the back side of the carry-on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed that it can’t go on carry on luggage
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag and all it’s features that it offered. Bought it for a backpacking trip to Europe. Was a little disappointed when I was ready to put it on my carry on handle and there was no flap in the back as advertised and shown in the pictures to put it there. So I constantly had to keep the bag either in my hand or on my back. Had to buy luggage straps to help with this issue. Besides that, the bag is very good and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original
customer_reviews.text: This is just about a stitch for stitch copy of a Swissgear SA1753, with an extra pocket in the middle section and a slightly different configuration at the top. That different design at the top makes a great deal of difference in the durability of the bag. I had the Swissgear bag for almost 4 years, but had a couple bits of the stitching come out early on... easily repaired. This bag has had no movement on the stitching, despite regularly carrying 4 laptops with power supplies, etc. totaling 37 lbs. The fabric has been more durable and better overall quality. It's also slightly cheaper. This is the rare case of the copy improving on the original.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for traveling
customer_reviews.text: While I previously owned a backpack of this basic design, it was heavier and didn't have quite the room inside for bulky things I occasionally needed to bring with me on long flights. But this backpack has met all my expectations with plenty of compartments and zippers that are smooth and easy to manipulate. It's comfortable on my back while carrying my 15" MacBook Pro along with all my gadgets and other accessories. Overall, the design, functionality, and price were very attractive to me.
customer_reviews.author: johnhbrandon

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this backpack
customer_reviews.text: After buying three backpacks during his fourth grade year only to be told they "are just ripping for no reason!" I looked into a durable, yet not dorky option for his fifth grade year. He. Loves. It. Now I regret buying something with such a large capacity, since he tends to hoard everything and now we have no natural consequences to quell his urges. This bag has all the bells and whistles!
customer_reviews.author: Jess F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how much room this Extra Large Backpack,TSA Friendly Durable Travel Computer Backpack with USB Charging Port/Headphones Hole for Men&Women,Water-Resistant Big Business College School Bookbag Fits 17 Inch Laptop&Notebook has!!! It holds everything......my: computer, headphones, cords, adapters, clothes, etc. I can pack this book bag and take a weekend trip with no problem. (
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hall

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively spaceous
customer_reviews.text: I had finally worn out my Targus Drifter II backpack and was in the market for a new one. Almost went with another, but this one caught my eye. When I first got it I was disappointed because it appeared to be significantly smaller than the Targus. However, I went through the motions of trying it out and was very pleasantly surprised. Everything fit fine, including my 17-inch laptop, and I had plenty of room to pack a single set of clothes for the traveling I do. I am a bit of a pack rat and all of the "junk" I had in my old backpack fit in this one just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Beaty Wade Tharp

customer_reviews.title: Built tough.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the back pack for a trip that I am going to take in the summer time, so at this point I can attest to how much stuff fits in it. What I can say is that this thing it huge, has lots of room, lots of packets to be able to carry all of the things I will need on the plane, I’m travelling with an 8 year old and with a 9 month old. The back pack appears to be very sturdy and hopefully very durable, the straps are nice and thick and the padding is super soft on my shoulders. Looking forward to using it in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and padding
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my High School Junior as there is not enough time to go to his locker between classes and must carry everything with him all day. The construction is excellent and has lots of room with plenty of pockets to keep even a teenage boy organized...at least through the second day of school which is where we are today. Will try to remember to add an update at the end of the school year in May 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Deb P

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag with a ton of space
customer_reviews.text: On first appearance, this bag looked about the same size as my old backpack. However, when I began taking everything from the old and putting into the new - I had pockets and storage areas that were still unused! This bag has a LOT of storage spaces. I am a tall guy with big hands, and I could get my hands into all of the areas without much difficulty. If you are looking for a good backpack with your ton of storage, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a backpack
customer_reviews.text: I carry 2 laptops - 15" and 17" - 2 full size tablets - tons of charging/power cables, spare battery for charging my phone, headphones, water bottle, emergency change of clothes and some snacks while I travel. The bag still isn't at capacity. The shoulder straps are nice and wide for comfort. My back keeps cool while carrying it. It is high quality - none of the stitching is coming undone yet. This is rare for backpacks I have owned in the past. I highly recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: John Justice

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was hanging on to a very old, yet awesome backpack that was falling apart. I did not want to replace it because I felt the quality had really gone down in the construction of backpacks (unless you want to pay a fortune). This backpack has a reasonable price and includes all features I was looking for. I love that it is TSA approved and is able to safely hold my iPod while I listen to my music. It's a great, sturdy backpack. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love mine, get one for yourself
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was more than I expected it to be! The straps are comfortable over my shoulders and I have a large and heavy laptop. Lots of convenient pockets for organization. Also, I love the external usb connection.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Tons of space
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and so much room!! Definitely feel that this will be a great travel backpack for our upcoming trip to London and Ireland. Zippers feel sturdy, it feels comfortable on my back, and the handle feels durable. It fits my 15.6 laptop with no problem. Not sure that the strap that goes over the laptop would stretch enough for a bigger laptop. If you didn't use the strap, you could probably go a little bigger on laptop size but not by much. Haven't had it in the rain so I can't say how well it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Carries everything you could need
customer_reviews.text: This backpack can handle all my college textbooks which is amazing. It has more pockets than you could ever need, and protects my laptop very well. My only complaint is that it started to tear after about a month of use, but I'm willing to look that over because I do not treat it very well; I often throw it in the bed of my truck during my commute to school and am generally just not very careful. But the zippers still work, the tears are very small and don't affect its effectiveness, and it even charges my phone. I'd 100% recommend this to anyone (especially students!!)
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer service & warranty
customer_reviews.text: my son's high school does not have lockers..he has used this bookbag since September carrying a lot of weight on a regular basis. It is of quality material & holds all of his needs. We were somewhat disappointed that it did not hold up for longer but understand things happen! It ripped in the front & inside near the seem of front pocket.. I notified the company as soon as I noticed. They were apologetic & asked for photos. I included them & a replacement backpack was here very quickly. I really appreciate their customer service & warranty. We will purchase more from them.
customer_reviews.author: cassie kuzan

customer_reviews.title: Just received this backpack and all components are nicely finished and appear to have been created with excellent ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this backpack and all components are nicely finished and appear to have been created with excellent materials. Comparable to the Swiss Gear unit it is replacing, it feels lighter, yet as durable. Time will tell how items such as the zippers will hold up, but we are off to a great start! Update July 2, 2018 -- just returned form 2 weeks in Switzerland and Austria. Everything great but did miss the horizontal strap at the top that loops over the extended handle of a rolling carry-on suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Mytech

customer_reviews.title: Straps bit into body
customer_reviews.text: I was able to pack it up and found it had a great amount of space and nice pockets. Unfortunately when I put it on, the straps were so stiff and wide they cut into my arms up near my shoulders. There was no way I could wear it through international airports. I used my old backpack. The construction was otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: Indie

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack , tons of room
customer_reviews.text: Love how much room there is for this back pack. I have room for 2 laptops , one a 17 inch. With room left over for a full size set of headphones. I highly recommend this pack. The construction is very well built and strong. I love the looks too. I got the dark blue camo and it totally rocks. There is no downside unless you are looking for a small ,poorly built pack then look elsewhere. I will recommend this to everyone. I did not know the name but bought it on a special sale and took a hunch. I really made a great gamble.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Emmendorfer

customer_reviews.title: 1 yr old and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this backpack for a year now and it is still going strong! Great storage compartments. Lots of room. LOVE usb hook-up outside the bag, hooked up a 20k ma battery and people will ask me to charge their phones too. Lifesaver on many accounts. Straps have good padding. Most of all, no zippers have broken! Unlike other "tactical" bags I have purchased. This is a great bag for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jason C Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works as a carry on luggage on US flights.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it was on sale. Now that I used it for a few months I can say I am very happy with the product and I would probably buy it even at a full price. The Important part for me: I took it as a carry on luggage on a few flights (Alaska flights) and had no problems with its size. It’s large and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: rmezei

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD BAG
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to replace a bag that I use everyday. I am rough on my bags and have been going through one back pack a year. This bag seems to be of a better quality in material quality, stitching, zippers, etc... and I hope it will stand the test of time. Bag is very versatile, has tons of different storage areas. Each compartment has double zippers so you have the ability to place a small lock on each compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Don C

customer_reviews.title: It is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: My first backpack had a broken clamp and was quickly replaced. The backpack is HUGE, there is a ton of space. I have a very big laptop, tools, cables and easily holds spare parts that i need for different jobs, and still plenty of room for other things. I could easily see this being used to travel with a weekend worth of clothes if packed right.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kane

customer_reviews.title: Overrated product, no customer service, do not waste your money and time
customer_reviews.text: This is an overrated product. The back has poor quality material, the pocket liners soon tore part, thereby making it useless. Tried emailing the customer service, after few emails no response has been received, I even bought an extended warranty, however, that warranty kicks in after the warranty period as result i have a garbage with me. The Backpack has no spine and always collapses as if it is trying to rollover, this makes searching for anything inside, also since it does not retain the shape it tends to slip of the shoulder when using only one strap.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncust67

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband when he travels. I bought in June and he did not have an opportunity to use until August. TSA approved. HA! TSA does not like this pack too many compartments. their words. The charging stations do not work at all!!. And both buckle straps on sides of pack broke where he had to so them. If I had used this sooner I would have returned it. very terrible am highly disappointed and embarrassed as it was a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Bizzchick

customer_reviews.title: Charge up and travel.
customer_reviews.text: Truly my favorite backpack that I have ever purchased. This is a tech lovers backpack and good for on the go needs. The USB port goes into the bag and you can connect your portable battery for on the go charging. The bag is very well made and seems like it will last for a long long time. Pick this bag up and you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: P.D.

customer_reviews.title: Fill it to the max and it still fit onto the overhead bins on the plane.
customer_reviews.text: I used this backpack during a 29 day trip through Europe as my carry on luggage. It is large and has many pockets. I wish I had used more beforehand. I thought I had lost a 1T thumb drive, it showed up somewhere around day 18 while I was looking for something else, crammed into one of those many pockets. It carried well and the covered cable handle was very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I recently went on a week long trip to thailand and was able to fit my laptop and all of my clothes in it as well as chargers and toiletries. the only things i dont like is the lack of a chest strap ( i did know it didnt have one when i bought it but it would be nice). And the fact that the back straps always slip when i sling the backpack on. Kind of nitpicking and maybe im just putting it on weirdly. overall great bag
customer_reviews.author: Silas

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I travel quite a bit and this backpack has made my travel experiences a whole lot better. Great storage that is large enough to carry my DSLR, extra lenses, and accessories with ease. It's very durable. I travel with a MacBook Air, iPad, iPhone, extra cables, meds, and more and I still have room. I like the fact that it's water resistant because many times I land in places where the rains are merciless. But I don't have to fear any damage with this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Josef Rasheed

product_meta.title: Extra Large Backpack,TSA Friendly Travel Laptop Computer Backpack Gifts for Men Women with USB Charging Port,School Bookbag Fits 17 Inch Laptops,Black
